messages.message: HI all, <!subteam^SQC4GLFN2> is working on build improvements and simplification over the next couple sprints. @cross talk - a podcast about crosswords - listen on apple podcasts or spotify and I have put together a proposal around replacing our current build system. https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PEXP/pages/229539908/Proposal+Replace+Custom+Build+System In general our goal is to simplify and bring us back to a JS environment that we are all familiar with.
@Jessica @Eric Han @Erick please review when you have some time today. Thank you!

I tried to do this a couple months ago:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/13257

The code is pretty stale but you can use it as a reference to get started. The reason why I didn’t follow through was because the bundle size got really large and didn’t show too much performance upgrade. Would love to see that part addressed with perhaps the mechanism you proposed in a previous PR that let’s you pick which apps to build

I like it! To be honest, I haven’t really delved too deeply into what exactly the make commands are doing, and it seems like my overall workflow wouldn’t change too much from this change? My only suggestion would be to preserve the `make build-local` and `make bundle-local` names and just change the underlying scripts to leverage the new tools
Tagging @dlluncor as well to confirm assumptions and review
